resources.string: Stopped! Camera is busy or does not work.
App closing because OpenCV Manager was not found on your device. Please install it from Google Play.

Preferences
 Capture period is a time between camera take a shot.
 Difference is a count of mismatches that mean another picture have to be saved.
 
 Usage
 Set up wished period and difference, move device to catch needed objects on preview and press Start.
 To end mapturing photos press Stop.
